metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2087 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the client in HexChat 2.11.0 allows remote IRC servers to read or modify arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the server name.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> patch is reverted in debian's hexchat package because it was causing a regression for some use-cases. logging the server name isn't the default configuration.

criterions.comment: hexchat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
xchat-gnome: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
